mil.nga.giat.geowave.datastore.accumulo.util

Class AccumuloKeyValuePairGenerator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.datastore.accumulo.util.AccumuloKeyValuePairGenerator<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of entries to index within Geowave

    public class AccumuloKeyValuePairGenerator<T>
extends Object
    Given a WritableDataAdapter and an Index, this class handles the creation of Geowave-formatted [Key,Value] pairs. The intent is that this class will be used within the Mapper of a MapReduce job to generate Keys and Values to be sorted during the shuffle-and-sort phase in preparation for bulk ingest into Accumulo via AccumuloFileOutputFormat.
